website_summaries.verdict: This product can replace your pet scent with something more pleasing.
pros: Smell can last for several days
Vanilla and lavender work well together
A very good smell that can cover up pet odors effectively
Does not require much powder to work
No wait time for product to be effective
cons: This product can leave a bit of a residue

customer_reviews.title: Container Had a Leak, and Powder All Over
customer_reviews.text: One of the set of 3 Carpet Fresh was received ok. In the same box, was another set of 3 Carpet Fresh. One of the containers has a hole, leak somewhere, and there was Carpet Fresh powder all in the bag -- covering all 3 containers with grit. Wiped off 2 of the containers, and contacted the seller for a replacement of the 3rd leaking container, since the container was more then half empty. Never heard back from the seller about a replacement bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Crafting Lady in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Very strong scent
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to freshen up our carpet and I thought this scent would be nice and light. I put a light dusting on our living room floor and waited 3 minutes. While I vacuumed I noticed how strong the smell is, but I figured it would dissipate pretty quickly. It has been 3 days and the smell is still overwhelming and gives me a headache. If you’re sensitive to smells do not get this. If not and you’re worried about carpet odors, this will definitely mask them.
customer_reviews.author: TotesMagotes

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this and I can never find it at my local grocery store so I was happy to find it on Amazon. We have two dogs (and the resultant accidents) and this does a good job of making the whole house smell less "doggy"!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived opened and leaking
customer_reviews.text: All three arrived already opened (missing the paper seal that normally comes under the plastic cap) and half-empty from leaking everywhere. Product itself smells good and works well, but I’m pretty sure these are only as cheap as they are because they were already used/opened by someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not like it used to be
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 bottles and one emptied in the box by time it made it to me. All other items in the box were also covered in powder. The scent is t as strong as I like it to be. Not like it used to be when this product first came out. Johnson has changed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Slyter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scent to remove pet smells in carpets
customer_reviews.text: The powder has a wonderful scent for any time of the year to help refresh up my living room rug. I have a dog and it completely takes away his smell and replaces it with a lavender aroma that is absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rippee

customer_reviews.title: A bit messy is all
customer_reviews.text: It spilled a bit out of the container by the time it arrived at my doorstep. It happens, stuff gets damaged on it’s way here some times. The scent is strong so I gave it 4/5 just because maybe some people will be sensitive to it. But I enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous smell.....
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hands down my favorite scent. I have tried numerous rug deodorizers, nothing has come close to this. It freshens up all the rooms in my home. I have to say it’s an addicting smell. I’ve even put it in small jars around the house as an air freshener. Cannot say enough how much I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bleu

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to freshen up my home and bring the smell of spring in during the winter. I was surprised at how nicely it smelled. I did not find the scent over powering. During the winter one of my dogs was sick, I did my best to air out the place, but I was glad to have this product around. The best part was that my hubby who has allergies to most scented products had no reaction to this one. I would recommend it to those with pets and kids or even to those people who just want to bring a flower scent to the home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product freshens up the whole room it says to Vacuum it but I let it sit for about a day or 2 then I Vacuum it
customer_reviews.author: Kala

customer_reviews.title: It deodorizes great and lasts for awhile
customer_reviews.text: It’s great I love the smell I use it to cover up little musty smells and it’s even great after vacuuming I would order again I got a good value on this product and it lasts
customer_reviews.author: tamasha williams

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent of this product. A little goes a long way. It is a little strong when you first put it down but it lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: wildflower

customer_reviews.title: Powder all in the bag
customer_reviews.text: The top was loose and spilled all in the bag and box. I will not order again
customer_reviews.author: Rainy

customer_reviews.title: Spreadability (size) and scent
customer_reviews.text: The product was reasonably priced, however, the scent did not linger long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: Used it heavily on carpet Let it sit for an hour. Made no difference.
customer_reviews.author: G Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: It smells great.
customer_reviews.text: This powder smells great. It leaves the room smelling fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Silviann

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Helps our house smell fresh even with two large dogs.
customer_reviews.author: TRG

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.text: I love the fragrance. It smells so clean and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: A little bit goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: Product works really good And a little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!! Especially with pets!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 dogs, two cats, and horses. Needless to say I’m always looking to keep my house smelling fresh. This stuff is fantastic!! Sprinkle very lightly on carpets and furniture. Really does the job and the scent lasts a few days. Not sure how good it is for your vacuum though!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Camp

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this smell its so fresh and relaxing with the lavender
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Forston

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Two of the canisters were damaged. Half of the powder waisted into the plastic bag and the box
customer_reviews.author: Delzoria Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Great powder
customer_reviews.text: My house smells wonderful everytime I vacuum, and will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Product tampering
customer_reviews.text: Canisters opened in delivery. Powder spilled everywhere when I opened the box. They looked like someone opened them and refilled it with imitation cheap stuff. Scent is weird, like chemical smell. Do not order this
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Curley

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love how it smells! Great for using once a week to freshen up spaces
customer_reviews.author: Belledonna Rosario

customer_reviews.title: No return policy and damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: Powder all over in the box and bag. Will not buy again. No return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Frey

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great smell and product. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use to much !
customer_reviews.text: The scent is highly concentrated. I wouldn’t recommend using a lot at once. Only a light dab will do the trick. But perfect for masking smells
customer_reviews.author: Loriey Dorillas

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!! UNRELIABLE PACKAGING!
customer_reviews.text: Really awful! 1 whole can opened while being shipped and half of another was also opened! I will NOT be ordering this again!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great deodorizer, but not the biggest fan of the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived open and spilled all over
customer_reviews.text: 2 bottles arrived open and plastic bag with holes, it has spilled all over in the box and over another product I had in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Vinicius

customer_reviews.title: opened containers
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 3 containers were opened and more than half empty! beware
customer_reviews.author: SueBand

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This powder smells amazing. I spread it before I vacuum my carpet, and the smell stays for days.
customer_reviews.author: Hepacuhu

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product the smell lasts much longer than other brands I’ve tried
customer_reviews.author: Berlys

customer_reviews.title: My order was a mess
customer_reviews.text: I received my order today what a mess there was so much powder on the top of each container all tops were loose and one was cracked not happy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Esther Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Must-have cleaning product for me!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I use it to freshen up my carpets and rugs. Love the scent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: floral scent
customer_reviews.text: Love the fragrant scent. Just what I was looking for to give my carpet a boost.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Harris

customer_reviews.title: Don't like its scent
customer_reviews.text: It's scent was far too strong, won't fit those who's sensitive to smells. I don't like it,either.
customer_reviews.author: Jimena Wesley

customer_reviews.title: This product is terrific
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is a little pricey but it more than makes up for the pleasing smell of lavender which is a natural stress relieving scent.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Moser

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The scent is fresh and relaxing. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Great smell.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! Some of the product did leak out, but that's expected with shipping a powder.
customer_reviews.author: Efren Ballestamon Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! This is how mine arrived... what a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Moore

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: it goes too fast. Easy to use a whole bottle on one room. Smells good!
customer_reviews.author: J. H. I.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: The box was damaged and the product spilled all in the box.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Bottles received half full
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and it's so hard to find lately so I ordered a pack of 3 online. I was extremely disappointed as all three were less than half full. I think if I combined the three it would probably equal one bottle. Definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Similar to other reviews - mine arrived with the contents spilled out. They need to rethink the packaging of this product or not sell online. Otherwise a nice scent, not too strong as some have reported.
customer_reviews.author: Marianna Storms

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon arrival and missing product
customer_reviews.text: I love to refresh my carpets with powder and decided I would purchase this product to have extra instead of buying other brands as needed. While I did receive all three in the pack, one of them was open and product was all over the box. In addition, other containers were not nearly as full as they should be. Save your money and go buy a $1 box of arm & hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong
customer_reviews.text: This has a very strong scent, which is exactly what we needed to get a smell out of our carpet our dog left. Very good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewLP

customer_reviews.title: smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: This sure makes the carpet - and therefore my whole home - smell very good! It works really well. It never leaves behind residue or stains the carpet. It just smells divine and fresh. I recommend it to anyone who wants to have a clean smelling house!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell
customer_reviews.text: Not overpowering and my husband has allergies. But makes the room smaller nicer than most sprays
customer_reviews.author: Kaddie 001

customer_reviews.title: Big mess
customer_reviews.text: The tops of all the canisters were broken or open with the powder having spilled into the plastic bag they were in and the bag had a hole in it as well. Big mess and the scent was not great anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene L.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a no for me...
customer_reviews.text: I typically love the scent of lavender and vanilla but this version is just not good. If this item was eligible for return I’d definitely send it back to where it came from. This powder seems to make per odors worse not better.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scent
customer_reviews.text: Such a great scent. A plus is that it lingers after being vaccummed.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Findley

customer_reviews.title: Makes vacuuming pleasant
customer_reviews.text: When you have two large dogs vacuuming becomes a weekly necessity and this stuff makes the chore a bit more less of a chore. It leaves the house smelling great for days and even makes my dogs smell good without bothering them at all.
customer_reviews.author: David Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and works very well. Will leave a residue no matter how hard you vacuum but works well as a pre shampoo treatment.
customer_reviews.author: shane grillo

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Smells great but only lasts about a day if that.
customer_reviews.author: Beezymcbreezy

customer_reviews.title: and everything was fine.
customer_reviews.text: The product was as described, arrived on time, and everything was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: awsome
customer_reviews.text: great product wonderful! for carpet specially when u have 3 cats and stuff i use almost the one hole bottle for upstairs take the hole thing because the bed rooms are huge and living room also! the Hawaii one smell wonderful an works great also the red raspberry is great also!
customer_reviews.author: edward

customer_reviews.title: Glade Lavender and Vanilla Carpet Powder
customer_reviews.text: The best scent ever! I hope Amazon and/or this merchant continue carrying this product.
customer_reviews.author: starlitedelite

customer_reviews.title: I used it and love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Atrrive on time and well packaging, I used it and love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: San M Aung

customer_reviews.title: great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: We have pets bin the house. This helps keep the carpet snd house smelling good. Good price too! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lela

product_meta.title: Glade Carpet and Room Powder, Lavender and Vanilla, 32-Ounce (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:3Glade Carpet and Room Powder, Lavender and Vanilla, 32-Ounce (Pack of 3)
feature_bullets: Proven to eliminate pet odors, dampness, mildew and smoke odors
Easy to use dispensing lid allows the consumer to adjust the amount of product that is used

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
